pr_title: Separate error code for insufficient storage

timeline.message: Separate error code for insufficient storage

timeline.bodyText: Reordering an enum should in practice not be a problem, but any usage of .ordinal() may result in unexpected behaviour.
timeline.author: bjorncs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -52,8 +52,9 @@ default void shutdown() { }
         NOT_FOUND,
         PRECONDITION_FAILED,
         BAD_REQUEST,
+        ERROR,

replies.bodyText: Which is why the use of ordinal() is discouraged, and definitely not used for this (brand new) enum :)
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Both .name() and .ordinal() is bad practice, yet we do it (at least the former) in our own code ;)
replies.author: bjorncs
